curvephonic.title: Curvephonic - AI Music Video Platform
curvephonic.description: Distributed system that transforms images into complete audiovisual experiences using mathematical analysis and AI.
curvephonic.challenge: The founder needed to build a complex microservices architecture with concurrent processing, image analysis, algorithmic music generation, and video synthesis. All from scratch, without a technical team.
curvephonic.solution: We designed and developed a Go-based microservices architecture with intelligent worker pools, parallel processing, and optimized rendering pipelines. Complete system running in 12 weeks with 4 integrated microservices.

achievements.1: 4-microservice architecture with concurrent processing (Go + RabbitMQ + MinIO)
achievements.2: 75% performance improvement with intelligent worker pools and auto-scaling
achievements.3: Complete pipeline: image analysis ‚Üí AI music ‚Üí video synthesis
achievements.4: Production-ready system with monitoring, metrics, and automated deployment

curvephonic.technologies: Go, RabbitMQ, MinIO, FFmpeg, MusicGen AI, Docker, Prometheus

manifesto.title: Astral Manifesto
manifesto.description: We don't believe in straight paths. We believe in orbits, quantum leaps and unexpected portals.
manifesto.core: An MVP is not a finished product: it's a frequency, a pulse that vibrates in another dimension. At AstralWalker we work so that your idea stops being trapped in a drawer and starts orbiting realities.

principle1.title: Speed with purpose
principle1.description: It's not about doing fast for the sake of it. It's about getting to market with the essentials, validating and evolving with real data.

principle2.title: Design that communicates
principle2.description: Every pixel tells a story. We create experiences that not only work, but emotionally connect with your users.

principle3.title: Code that scales
principle3.description: Your MVP must grow with you. We write clean, documented code ready for the future ahead.
